short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly see which Facebook posts you've liked, which ones you haven't, and which ones are ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click the Likey button while viewing your Facebook feed (or while viewing a friend's posts) to see which posts you've liked already and which ones you haven't.  Posts you've liked will be colored blue and posts you haven't liked will be colored orange for easy differentiating.

Some sponsored posts will show in red.  Sponsored posts that have been liked by one of your friends currently show up in orange, but this will be fixed in a future version.

As you scroll down the page and more posts are displayed, Likey will automatically color them in blue, orange, or red (as applicable).  If you refresh the page or go to another Facebook page, you'll need to click the Likey button again to run it on that page.

If you discover any bugs, please leave a detailed comment so the issue can be addressed.  Suggestions always welcome!
